

```{r}
train = postdata[1:80000, c("Title", "Tags")]
test = postdata[80001:86912, c("Title", "Tags")]
```

```{r}
library(stringr)

print(test$Title[1])
train_title = test$Title[1] %>% toString() %>% str_replace_all("\\?", "") %>% strsplit(" ")
train_vector = word_bag2 %in% train_title[[1]]


innerProduct = lapply(train$Title, function(x){
        (word_bag2 %in% (x %>% toString() %>% str_replace_all("\\?", "") %>% strsplit(" "))[[1]] + 0) %*% train_vector
    })
innerProduct = unlist(innerProduct)
print(train[which(innerProduct==max(innerProduct)), ]$Title)
```
